CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Pass the final test stage positioned above or below the Browse Course Page stage?
SRP.A: The Pass the final test stage is positioned {below} the Browse Course Page stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Browse Course Page?
VE.A: The value of stage Browse Course Page is {100%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Register Learning Platform?
VE.A: The value of stage Register Learning Platform is {64%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Browse Course Page, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Earn a certificate, with a value of {16%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Register Learning Platform to stage Register Courses?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Register Learning Platform to stage Register Courses is {21%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 35%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Browse Course Page} stage has {100%}, the {Register Learning Platform} stage has {64%}, the {Register Courses} stage has {43%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 19%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 19% and 35%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Complete the first lesson} stage has {28%}, the {Complete the assignment} stage has {19%}, the {Pass the final test} stage has {19%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Browse Course Page to Register Learning Platform, or from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Browse Course Page} to {Register Learning Platform} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Pass the final test to Earn a certificate, from stage Browse Course Page to Register Learning Platform, or from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Browse Course Page} to stage {Register Learning Platform} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test, from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment, or from stage Register Learning Platform to Register Courses?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Learning Platform} to stage {Register Courses} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Browse Course Page} and {Register Learning Platform} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete the assignment} and {Pass the final test} stages.
